channel.title: Stefan Müller on Tom Louwerse
channel.description: Recent content in Stefan Müller on Tom Louwerse

item.title: The electoral cycle effect in parliamentary democracies
item.description: Does government party support decline in a monotonic fashion throughout the legislative cycle or do we observe a u-shaped “electoral cycle effect”? Moving beyond the study of midterm election results, this is the first comparative study to assess the cyclical pulse of government party support in parliamentary democracies based on voting intention polls from 171 cycles in 22 countries.
